author: cnbc.com
title: Riverchase Dermatology and Cosmetic Surgery Acquires Practice of Charles A. Buchbinder, M.D.
text:
PALM BEACH and BROWARD COUNTIES, Fla., Feb. 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Riverchase Dermatology and Cosmetic Surgery is pleased to announce that Charles A. Buchbinder, M.D has joined the Riverchase Dermatology family of practices and we welcome him to our team of practitioners. The offices, located at 2499 Glades Road in Boca Raton, Florida and at 1880-A W Hillsboro Blvd in Deerfield Beach, Florida will continue to offer high quality dermatology services patients have come to know and trust from both Dr. Charles A. Buchbinder and Riverchase Dermatology.
Charles A. Buchbinder, M.D. graduated from the University of the East College of Medicine in Manila, Philippines in 1981 and has been practicing dermatology for over 32 years. He completed a residency at the University of Cincinnati Hospital and is currently affiliated with Boca Raton Regional Hospital.
"My goal is to achieve optimal results for my patients. I strive to provide these results in a comfortable and professional environment. A partnership with Riverchase Dermatology will mean just that. The organization's professionalism and expertise will allow for continued comprehensive dermatology services in a family environment," said Charles A. Buchbinder, M.D.
"Dr. Charles A. Buchbinder is a well-respected dermatologist in the Boca Raton and Deerfield Beach communities. Our goal is to continue to offer outstanding dermatological care in a courteous, efficient and caring environment. We are excited to welcome Dr. Buchbinder to our team of qualified professionals at Riverchase Dermatology and Cosmetic Surgery," said Andrew T. Jaffe, MD, FAAD, Founder and Chief Medical Officer of Riverchase Dermatology and Cosmetic Surgery.
As part of its dedication to providing quality patient care in Florida, Riverchase Dermatology and Cosmetic Surgery continues to expand to reach a greater number of those in need of dermatology services at a convenient location. With the addition of these two new office locations, Riverchase now offers a total of 34 convenient dermatology and cosmetic surgery locations with 68 providers throughout the state of Florida.
Visit www.RiverchaseDermatology.com to learn more or to request an appointment.
About Riverchase Dermatology and Cosmetic Surgery
Riverchase Dermatology and Cosmetic Surgery is one of Florida's largest, fastest growing and most comprehensive skin centers. Founded in Naples, Florida in 2000 by Andrew T. Jaffe, MD, FAAD, Riverchase continues to execute on its vision of providing the most comprehensive skin cancer, dermatology and cosmetic surgery services. The caring and skilled providers at Riverchase use the latest techniques and equipment to diagnose and treat a wide range of skin disorders and cosmetic concerns. Riverchase has many convenient locations throughout Florida. For more information, visit www.RiverchaseDermatology.com .
